title: crea8iveant
author: crea8iveant
content: I saw on reddit about Thanos.ai for content creation. comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: Automated content creation is a waste of time for several reasons, mainly:1. Google can detect and will penalize AI generated content.2. Readers and subscribers are looking for genuine, original content.If you want to be successful you have to provide valuable content or services. People can tell if actual work is being put into a site.
